text: [{"role": "user", "content": "What is artificial intelligence?"}, {"role": "assistant", "content": "Artificial intelligence is the simulation of human intelligence in machines programmed to think and learn like humans."}]

[{"role": "user", "content": "Explain supervised learning."}, {"role": "assistant", "content": "Supervised learning is a type of machine learning where models are trained on labeled data to make predictions on new, unseen data."}]

[{"role": "user", "content": "What is unsupervised learning?"}, {"role": "assistant", "content": "Unsupervised learning is a type of machine learning that finds patterns in data without labeled examples or explicit guidance."}]
